HomePage.whyUsDesc: Our restaurant has been serving people since 2014 and has 5 branches across Tashkent.

HomePage.card2Desc: Only fresh daily products — natural, rich, and authentic taste
HomePage.card3Desc: All our chefs are professionals in their field with over 5 years of experience
HomePage.card4Desc: Friendly staff and a warm environment — special care for every guest

NewsPage.newsTitle: Opening Ceremony of Our New Branch
NewsPage.newsDesc: Yoqimli Taomlar proudly opened its new branch with a grand ceremony. The opening event took place on [date] and was attended by company management, staff, loyal customers, and industry representatives.
NewsPage.newsDesc2: The new branch stands out with its modern design and convenient location. Guests can enjoy high-quality service, a wide menu selection, and a comfortable atmosphere. During the ceremony, special promotions and gifts were presented to visitors...

AboutPage.aboutDesc: Every dish is a part of our story. For years, we have been welcoming our guests with flavor, hospitality, and genuine care.
AboutPage.startDesc: By the winter of 2018, our restaurant had expanded significantly. During this period, we opened more than three branches across Tashkent, added nearly ten new dishes to our menu, and placed a strong emphasis on traditional national cuisine.
AboutPage.cook: There Is Passion Behind Every Dish
AboutPage.name: Rahmonbekov Abdurahmon
AboutPage.qualityDesc: By the winter of 2018, our restaurant experienced rapid growth. We expanded our presence throughout Tashkent, enriched our menu with new offerings, and continued to focus on delivering authentic national flavors.
